Mark S Fox is a character created by Philippa Gardner.
Mark S. Fox is linked to https://mathscinet.ams.org/mathscinet/MRAuthorID/315611. He is also linked to http://www.eil.utoronto.ca/profiles/foxpro.html. He is also linked to http://www.doc.ic.ac.uk/<unk>pg/ and https://dl.acm.org/profile/81100498847. He is also linked to http://www.doc.
The primary affiliations of Mark S Fox and Philippa Gardner are Imperial College London, UK and University of Toronto, Canada.
